mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(AUTHOR_GROUP_SN) + 1,1) AS AUTHOR_GROUP_SN FROM TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP ( AUTHOR_GROUP_SN, AUTHOR_GROUP_NM, USE_AT, FRST_REGISTER_SN, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDUSR_SN, LAST_UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( #{groupSn}, #{groupNm}, #{useAt}, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO TCM_EMPLYRBY_GROUP_AUTHOR ( EMPLYR_SN, AUTHOR_GROUP_SN, FRST_REGISTER_SN, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDUSR_SN, LAST_UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( #{emplyrSn}, #{authorGroupSn}, #{sEmplyrSn}, SYSDATE, #{sEmplyrSn}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT PERSONAL.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN GROUP_SN, GRP.AUTHOR_GROUP_NM GROUP_NM FROM TCM_EMPLYRBY_GROUP_AUTHOR PERSONAL, TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP GRP WHERE PERSONAL.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = GRP.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN AND GRP.USE_AT = 'Y' AND PERSONAL.EMPLYR_SN = #{emplyrSn} ORDER BY GROUP_SN
